org.springframework.beans.factory.support
Interface BeanFactoryLoader

All Known Implementing Classes:
XmlBeanFactoryLoader
public interface BeanFactoryLoader

Interface to be implemented by objects that can load BeanFactories (usually on behalf of application components such as EJBs).

Since:
20-Jul-2003
Version:
$Id: BeanFactoryLoader.java,v 1.1.1.1 2003/08/14 16:20:19 trisberg Exp $
Author:
Rod Johnson

Method Summary
 BeanFactory loadBeanFactory()
          Load the BeanFactory.
 

Method Detail

loadBeanFactory

public BeanFactory loadBeanFactory()
                            throws BootstrapException
Load the BeanFactory.
Returns:
BeanFactory loaded BeanFactory. Never returns null.
Throws:
BootstrapException - if a BeanFactory cannot be loaded
